column1: # Geographic (OGC:CRS:84) segments, and attached orthodromic/loxodromic distances (in meter).

# Special thanks: Nantes university (http://www.sciences.univ-nantes.fr/sites/genevieve_tulloue/Meca/RefTerre/Orthodromie1.php) and Le Mans university (http://ressources.univ-lemans.fr/AccesLibre/UM/Pedago/physique/02/divers/ortholoxo.html) for their online distance calculators.

# Columns: title for the segment, longitude of start point, latitude of start point, longitude of end point, latitude of end point, orthodromic distance betweeen start and end point, loxodromic distance between start and end point
